metadata.title: CVE-2015-4625 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in the authentication_agent_new_cookie function inPolicyKit (aka polkit) before 0.113 allows local users to gain privilegesby creating a large number of connections, which triggers the issuance of aduplicate cookie value.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4625` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-polkit-1.0 - 0.105-11ubuntu1
libpolkit-agent-1-0 - 0.105-11ubuntu1
libpolkit-backend-1-0 - 0.105-11ubuntu1
libpolkit-gobject-1-0 - 0.105-11ubuntu1
policykit-1 - 0.105-11ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: policykit-1 package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.105-11ubuntu1').
